post.body: . . . .Yeah. Um. That's all I got tonight-_-. . .
Bite the bile and fix fix this treason. Cuz im thinking baby your the one to blame-Face the wall and take your-Flames
Yeah, BANG! BANG!-Now they're all the same-Things turn tricks for just one reason-And now she's bleeding at the-C a b a r e t.
I am the saint with luminous eyes-Forever brightening up the skies- Once again we're so cadavered-Once again we're so old-NEWS!
So- With little regard to anything but your Own- Sit strait and fix your crown- Now-
You are the king with a poisonous heart- Waiting to shove it all back into- m o n o t o n y-
This is the measure- Where u figured u'd finally found a place of your own- turns around and sings a tune- I am the sun and u are the moon-
A silence dashed in blue- It's the cabaret-Oh, so he wont find out- Being cheat is such an art- Delude yourself to the flailing facts-
Yes, It's that time again. TIME TO WRITE WORDS FOR EARS TO EAT!
Twas the night before X-mas, and Everyone was Shopping!
Well. It's official. I'm addopted and my parents are Brussle sprouts.
I will never lie to you. He said. My lies are on my tongue and not my hands. He said. Ha. Ha. Ha.
"There's a bullet in his head," "He was Shot!?!" "No. . . Somebody threw it at him." Hahahaha!
And whoever said Love was rewarding-Has obviously never done karaoke in an maid getUp before. . .-_-
. . .yes.. . .I am disturbed when I peer into the mirror.
. . .Savan's here though. Guess I'll just have to settle for her enchanting my boots, and +5-ing my dexterity. . .
THIS IS LEVEL ONE! WHERE IS MY ULTIMATELY USLESS BLUNT OBJECT DAMNIT!
Now. . .Where the hell is that pipe wretch?
Taking oppertunity in cover of darkness to ready counter-attack. . .
Little un' in the bathroom cowering. . .Mother always did warn against sharing my mind thoughts. . .
